name: Paasa
long_description:
Paasa is the global investing platform for aspiring HNIs. We simplify access to global markets from emerging economies, while offering an AI advisor and robo-investing.


‘Pre-HNIs’ and HNIs in countries like India want to diversify their wealth internationally. Most customers hesitate due to lack of guidance on foreign investments, tax laws that change every year, and slow outflows from local banks.


These barriers keep global investing out of reach, reserved for the top 0.001% who can afford wealth managers and family offices. We’re changing that.


Our vision is to bring all the opportunities of the 0.001% without any hassle.
one_liner: Give HNIs in emerging markets a global investment portfolio
